I've started to learn HTML with courses on htmlacademy, w3schools, and also at The complete Web Developer in 2019: Zero to Mastery on Udemy.

Knowledges:

  • HTML basics (content formatting, links, scripts, styles)
  • HTML Forms
  • HTML5 Semantics
  • HTML Graphics(SVG, canvas)
  • HTML Media (video and audio)
  • HTML API (geolocation)

Most of my projects styling with CSS. For small, simple projects like JS30 coding challenge I used flexbox model for responsive layout. Also I've trying to make stylesheets with BEM methodology. In some challenges I used CSS transitions and transforms to animate interfaces.
